section_title: 30f04 - Application of Sec 6(e)(2) - linen supply services.
text:
Section 6(e)(2) of FLSA applies to every
employer providing linen supply services under a contract with the United
States or any subcontract thereunder. It is not necessary that the contract be
subject to SCA.
html: Section 6(e)(2) of FLSA applies to every employer providing linen supply services under a contract with the United States or any subcontract thereunder. It is not necessary that the contract be subject to SCA.
